com.mpos.lottery.te.trans.service

接口 TransactionRetryLogServiceAsyn

  • 所有已知实现类:
    TransactionRetryLogServiceAsynImpl

    public interface TransactionRetryLogServiceAsyn
    The 'XXXServiceAsyn' means this service will require a new transaction. Please refer to 'transaction definition' part of spring-service.xml for more information.

      • checkMaxValidationTimes

        TransactionRetryLog checkMaxValidationTimes(Transaction trans,
                                          java.lang.String ticketSerialNo,
                                          int transType,
                                          Game game)
                                            throws ApplicationException
        check if client has issued same transaction too many times.
        参数:
        trans - The transaction
        ticketSerialNo - The serial number of ticket(lotto, ig, toto, etc)
        transType - The transaction type.
        game - The game associates with given ticket.
        返回:
        true if the total times has exceeded max allowed times, or false.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException
